📆 Calendar

Lectures (yellow) are held in CENTR 119. There is no discussion section.

In-person office hours (yellow) are held in the HDSI building Halıcıoğlu Data Science Institute Room 355. There will be two separate queues for lab checkoffs and general questions.

For online office hours (black), click on each slot to get the Zoom link for each person’s office hours. We will try to arrange the first hour for questions and the second hour for checkoffs.

Sam’s office hours are for general questions. The TAs’ office hours are specifically for lab checkoffs. Please sign up for one of the TAs’ office hours using the link below before Monday at 3 PM.

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/16etkY7eaq-gBkuEMPWiQZaRqZFke4lNBmdT1wHvQUWg/edit
